overview.overview: Magento delivers the features you need to build and grow a unique online store from the ground up.

highlights: Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Server
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html:
This is a repackaged Magento with professional support for your business. Magento is the leading platform for open commerce innovation. Magento Open Source eCommerce software delivers the features you need to build and grow a unique online store from the ground up. For those who need an all-in-one cloud solution that is optimized for Magento, consider Magento Commerce edition.

Image Components: Magento Open Source eCommerce 2.4, Apache 2.4, MySQL 8.0, PHP 7.4, OpenJDK 1.8, RabbitMQ 3.8, erlang 23.3, Varnish, Elasticsearch, Docker, Redis on AmazonLinux2.

EC2 requirements: CPU no less than 2 core, Memory no less than 4G.

Applicable Scene: eCommerce, Online store, B2C, B2B, Product information management,international trading.

Disclaimer: We can't guarantee the open source software does not have vulnerability or the security risks which is the responsibility of user according to the open source licenses.

Intellectual Property Statement: The stack of this offer includes a wide range copies of open source and free software, but the Copyrights, Patents and Trademarks are legal protections for original owner.

Take Take Magento Open Source as an example:

The Magento name and logo are either registered trademarks or trademarks of of Adobe Inc.. Magento Open Source is distributed under the OSL 3.0, and is thus open source software.

If you are aware of a breach of the any IP in this offer, please don't hesitate to contact us: legal@websoft9.com, we will correct it ASAP

faq.value: Yes, you should installed your language package first

faq.key: Why should I link to the Magento Marketplace?
faq.value: Just link Magento Marketplace, you can use the resources of Marketplace online.

faq.key: Adobe Commerce vs Magento Open Source?
faq.value: Magento Open Source is the formal name of Adobe Commerce
